andymark.com

8 mm to 1/2 in. Hex Shaft Adapter

8 mm to 1/2 in. Hex Shaft Adapter

Andymark sells these 8mm to .5 hex adapters that go right on the neo, make sure you buy lots of the keys for the shaft though.
